1110100111111111 0011110101111001 1 -> sum: 0010011101111001, cout: 1
0101011011110011 1001111110000111 1 -> sum: 1111011001111011, cout: 0
0110110011101011 0011110100010011 0 -> sum: 1010100111111110, cout: 0

0101000010010001 1011110000010110 0 -> sum: 0000110010100111, cout: 1
1000011110001100 1110101000100100 0 -> sum: 0111000110110000, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
